definition: A protective headgear typically worn in certain work environments or during specific activities to safeguard the wearer's head from potential hazards or injuries. It is commonly utilized in industries such as construction, manufacturing, or any other occupation involving potential head impacts or falling objects.

examples.german: Ich trage einen Schutzhelm auf der Baustelle.
examples.english: I wear a protective helmet on the construction site.

examples.german: Der Schutzhelm schützt den Kopf vor Verletzungen.
examples.english: The protective helmet protects the head from injuries.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, einen Schutzhelm beim Fahrradfahren zu tragen.
examples.english: It is important to wear a protective helmet when cycling.

examples.german: Der Schutzhelm ist Teil der persönlichen Schutzausrüstung.
examples.english: The protective helmet is part of personal protective equipment.

examples.german: Der Schutzhelm muss den Sicherheitsstandards entsprechen.
examples.english: The protective helmet must comply with safety standards.
